70010000088020.description:
You Are an Apprentice Librarian:
Step into the shoes of a new library staff member and work entirely at the front desk. Lend out materials, assist patrons with their inquiries, and more. Complete your one-month probation period to finish the game.

260 Fictional Books:
Each book includes a cover, title, author, publisher, and summary. Enjoy the collection as a fictional book gallery.

Your Daily Tasks Matter:
Each book you lend becomes a turning point in someone’s story. Who returns, what they borrow next, and how their lives unfold — it all depends on your choices behind the desk.

Multiple Endings:
The game features several bad endings, plus one normal ending and one true ending.

Endless Mode:
A bonus mode where patrons arrive one by one with reference requests.*
Search quickly and accurately to find what they need. Try to beat your personal best.

*In this app, "reference requests" refer to using the search system to locate materials requested by patrons.
70010000088020.intro: Become a Librarian in a Visual Novel Set in a Single Scene.
70010000088020.name: Kakureza Library

70010000088854.description:
Get ready to take part in MotoGP™25!

FEEL EVERY DETAIL OF THE 2025 SEASON
Join the official Championship and step into the boots of your favourite riders to master the most iconic bikes and tracks of the season. Live the most realistic race thrills ever thanks to Unreal Engine 5, MotoGP™ Stewards ensuring fair battles, and an overhauled sound design, recorded on-site from official bikes.

FORGE YOUR RACING LEGACY
Your path to becoming a MotoGP™ Legend starts here! Deep dive into your bike's evolution, choose your own career Turning Points during the season and develop social relationships off track, then watch how these choices evolve over the weekend. Master the Riders Market dynamics to make your journey always unique.

MASTER YOUR CRAFT
Train like a champion with the new Race Off disciplines available in Career and Quick Modes. Ride Minibikes, Motard and Flat Track bikes on 4 dedicated tracks across 2 original environments. Take on challenges like elimination and relay races, boost your rider's fitness, unlock accessories and sharpen your skills to dominate the track!

RACE YOUR OWN WAY
Maximum playability or full-sim challenge? Jump right into the action with the new Arcade Experience for immediate adrenaline-pumping fun. Or master every track detail of the track, fuel consumption, and electronics in the Pro Experience, for an authentic MotoGP™ realism!
Take full control of your bike with an improved Adaptive Difficulty Mode, Neural Aid System and new Tutorial.
70010000088854.name: MotoGP™25

70010000090875.description: A mystical comedy adventure with sarcastic British wit, hand-drawn cartoon art, and an innovative shape-shifting ability for solving puzzles.
70010000090875.name: Plot of the Druid

70010000093268.description:
Blazing Trail is an isometric pixel art shooter that requires daring on-the-fly strategy. Use machine guns, missiles and laser power-ups to take down enemy soldiers, demolish buildings and watchtowers, destroy gates, shoot down aircrafts and face off against huge bosses across 7 sprawling combat zones.

Roll through checkpoints and save progress between stages. Complete your mission solo or team up with a friend for cooperative play! Can you escape the terrorists’ clutches and save the world from their maniacal plans?

• Escape with the advanced military vehicle that you helped develop!
• Blast through 7 zones with guns, missiles and lasers!
• Navigate freely from an isometric overhead perspective!
• Rescue hostages and take down big bosses along the way!
• Drive solo or team up with a friend for cooperative multiplayer.
• Enjoy retro pixel art graphics in HD widescreen style!
70010000093268.intro: Humanity’s fate rides with you in this vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.
70010000093268.name: Blazing Trail

70010000093659.description:
■Introduction
Following three women on an adventure through the Land of the Gods, Seedsow Lullaby is a visual novel that features no choices or branching paths.
*There are some scenes depicting flood trauma in the story.

■Story
Misuzu lost her mother at a young age. 
On her sixteenth birthday, in the spring of 2023, she is visited by a lone girl. 
The girl turns out to be her mother, Yoko, also aged sixteen.

Yoko explains that she has been chosen as a Maiden to conduct the Seedsow Ceremony in the dwelling place of the gods, the Eternal Realm, and has traveled from 1996 to invite Misuzu along on her journey.

The Seedsow Ceremony is a funeral for the gods, and is necessary for a new generation of immortal deities to usher in a new age. Seedsow Maidens must travel the Eternal Realm and have the ancient god elders accept their deaths before True Winter comes and defiles the land.

Accompanying her mother Yoko, Misuzu travels to the year 2050, where her own sixteen-year-old daughter, Tsumugi, joins them as they make for the Eternal Realm.

With the addition of Hiruko, who claims to be Misuzu's younger brother and acts as the group's guide, the foursome journey through lush landscapes made no less resplendent by True Winter's looming approach.

The young group has been brought together as though by a miracle, but what awaits them at the end of their journey?
70010000093659.intro:
My mother, my daughter, and me
—three sixteen-year-olds on an extraordinary adventure.
70010000093659.name: Seedsow Lullaby

70010000093930.description:
Live the life of a secret agent and feel the rush of non-stop action! Be ready to jump out of windows, grab onto wires and eliminate enemies. High-speed adventure awaits!

Be fast and don't let anyone shoot you. Be accurate and send your enemies to their grandfathers as quickly as possible. No time to look around. You are on a mission! Slide, shoot, win, repeat. The pattern is clear. Just follow the right steps. 

Clear each level you enter. It's not as easy as you think - you're moving fast and the enemies are all around you.

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

To slide and to attack!
70010000093930.name: Slide Defenders

70010000094506.description: Witching Stone combines elements of puzzle games, roguelites and deckbuilders! Incrementally improve your spellbook, and find patterns on a unique puzzle grid, to battle deeper and deeper into the dungeon!
70010000094506.intro: A puzzle game matched with a deckbuilder! Customise your spellbook and weave spells with coloured stones.
70010000094506.name: Witching Stone

70010000096106.description:
Embark on a magical journey with Mystic Pathways, a puzzle game that challenges your logic and creativity. Manipulate enchanted trails on a beautifully designed hexagonal board to guide mystical fairies in collecting magical crystals and activating sacred altars.

Captivating Challenges: Explore intuitive mechanics that evolve in complexity, requiring strategic planning and clever solutions.

Hypnotic Environments: Discover breathtaking landscapes, from blooming meadows to enchanted forests and crystal caves, each introducing new challenges and special mechanics.

Immersive Sensory Experience: Let yourself be carried away by an ethereal soundtrack and stunning artistic design, making each level both relaxing and stimulating.

Thirty Levels to Explore: Test your skills through progressively more challenging stages, unlocking unique pieces and innovative mechanics along the way.

Whether you're a puzzle lover or a casual player looking for a magical experience, Mystic Pathways is sure to captivate your mind and soul.

Get ready to chart your path in the world of magic.
70010000096106.intro: Unveil the Secrets of the Enchanted Paths
70010000096106.name: Mystic Pathways

70050000053521.description:
This DLC grants access to 10 songs including Touhou original "Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle"

Check out the official page for details on the songs.
Official Page: https://danmaku.jp/en/
70050000053521.intro: Extra Song Pack with 10 songs that include the original "Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle"
70050000053521.name: Extra Song Pack 8

70010000057866.description:
Stasis Valley is a 2D puzzle-platformer that follows Adam, a young man who has recently experienced a great loss. After this event he descends into a surreal valley within his own mind, where he must attempt to make sense of the world around him (as well as his emotions). Uncover the valley's secrets, and confront the dangers lurking within.

• 100+ levels
• Space-bending mechanics
• A unique, stylized look
• A lovely score composed by Mike Eramo
• A story about loss, avoidance, and acceptance
70010000057866.intro: Awaken a valley frozen in time.
70010000057866.name: Stasis Valley

70010000084805.description: Step into a magical world as a whimsical Grim Reaper in this enchanting narrative flight simulation. You’ll fly through fantastical, enchanted realms brimming with wonder and magic, each landscape more breathtaking than the last. Your mission is to break cages that hold mystical souls, each soul revealing legendary stories of heroism, love, and adventure. As you free these souls, you’ll piece together 11 epic tales that transport you to a realm of fantasy and myth. The non-violent gameplay is both relaxing and captivating, inviting you to collect energy for your shots, explore stunningly crafted environments, and lose yourself in a world where every soul's story is a doorway to another fantastical adventure.
70010000084805.intro: Become a whimsical Grim Reaper, flying through enchanted realms to free mystical souls. Experience 11 epic stories in this peaceful, magical adventure.
70010000084805.name: Beyond Memories - Tales From the Heart

70010000089363.description:
This is the German version of "2weistein - Ronger Pirates".

The Story
All was peace and quiet in Asban and the whole land of Trillion – until that day on which the gates remained closed, as if by ghostly hand, and other strange things happened. The mean magician Godron has stolen the book „Mathematica“ from the creator of Trillion, and has cast an evil spell over the city: a ban on mathematics. Godron wants to gain power over the whole land and transform the world according to his will. But there are the brave heroes Bernard and Celestine with their friend 2weistein who want to put a stop to Godron to keep Trillion peaceful and beautiful, and no one is ever to be afraid again!
 
About the 2weistein games
The unique and fantastic idea behind the series of 2weistein games is to train maths in a real 3D action adventure. Embedded in the tantalizing story the player has to solve maths quests or puzzles to get ahead in the game. It was developed by game specialists in cooperation with teachers and psychologists and won several prices and awards.
 
Features
Language: German
Puzzles and maths quests in a real game and great story
Action adventure game with maths quests
High quality 3D graphics and fully animated 3D characters
Fondly designed characters and varying 3D-animations
Atmospheric soundtrack and native speakers
6 level, playing time about 6 hours, high replay value
Playable character: Bernard
Written and spoken instructions with lots of encouragement
Tasks seamlessly integrated into the gameplay, thereby high exercise and learning effect
Choice between number range: 1-100, 100-1000, 1000-10.000
Training maths: Basic arithmetic operations
Puzzles
Helps to control impulsiveness, concentration, attention
Action planning and skill exercises
Lots of fun

„2weistein in Rongerland“ is a self-contained episode from the Action Adventure  „2weistein – Das Geheimnis des roten Drachen“.
70010000089363.intro: Action Adventure and practicing maths basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.
70010000089363.name: 2weistein in Rongerland

70010000089698.description:
Blast your way through hell in Shotgun Cop Man, a precision platformer where your weapons are your wings.

Embark on a mission to arrest Satan armed with a devastating arsenal and a relentless thirst for glory. Propel yourself through hordes of irritable demons, devious traps, and thrilling challenges using the only two things you can trust: your wits and your weapons.

Firepower Propulsion
Master your movement through the twisted corners of hell as every shot propels you forward. Whether dodging enemies, scaling walls, or leaping impossible gaps, your weapons are the key to both survival and traversal.

Explosive Campaign and Challenges
Dive into an action-packed campaign in over 150 levels and face off against intense boss battles, then put yourself to the test and beat all the No Damage, Speedrun and Kill All challenges.
70010000089698.intro: GO TO HELL, ARREST SATAN. Propel yourself to justice and glory on a journey through hell in this punchy, crunchy, son-of-a-gun precision platformer from the creator of My Friend Pedro.
70010000089698.name: Shotgun Cop Man

70010000091361.description:
[Prologue]
In the year 20XX, an asteroid that came from outside the solar system is approaching the Earth.
Humanity responds with a nuclear attack, but the meteorite is not destroyed and splits into 50 pieces──.
The only hope left is a lone demolition specialist!

[Game Overview]
"Earth Saver" is an exhilarating action game where you demolition and dismantle a giant meteorite approaching the Earth!
Place a bomb and it will explode with a bang in three counts!
If you successfully split the meteorite into small pieces, it will burn up in the atmosphere and the Earth will be safe!
Connect and explode, split cleanly, the exhilaration is at its MAX!
But if you're not careful, the large pieces will head straight for the Earth...!
This is a highly strategic action game where the timing and placement of the explosion are key.

The controls are simple.
Just move your character and place the bomb with the button!
Earth Saver is easy for anyone to play, yet deep.
It's a game that both beginners and blasting specialists can enjoy.

Plan your route within the limited time and protect the Earth with your intuition and judgment!

[Enjoy it over and over again with 7 diverse modes!]

[Difficulty modes]
EASY: Practice mode for beginners. No enemies, so you can relax!
NORMAL: A well-balanced mode for intermediate players.
HARD: A challenge mode for advanced players with a strict time limit!
EXPERT: A serious mode with fast enemies and no time carryover!
ULTIMATE: An ultra-difficult mode where you aim to clear all stages without making any mistakes!

[Featured challenge modes]
ENDLESS: Infinite stages with no goal! Challenge yourself to see how far you can go. Online rankings are also supported!
BATTLE: A blasting showdown between two players! A battle mode that you can enjoy with your friends by sharing play!
70010000091361.intro: It's up to you to blast away the approaching meteorite and become the savior of the Earth!
70010000091361.name: EARTH SAVER

70010000091482.description:
■GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
A news comes in.
It says the old cafe in my town is closing down soon.

I never miss visiting there
when I come back to the town.

This place has been my favorite since my childhood.

The best part is its hall, which presents a nostalgic 
impression that is reminiscent of the past eras.

As I get to a table, I found myself in the uncomfortable silence.

Seems the door is locked tightly.

I'm trapped. Need to get out…
70010000091482.intro:
The classic escape game for you, staged in the nostalgic cafe.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?
70010000091482.name: Escape Game The Nostalgic Cafe

70010000091523.description:
Immerse yourself in "Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki," a captivating gaming experience that blends Beat em Up, RPG, and life simulation in a vast open world full of possibilities. Explore the bustling streets of Nishinari-ku in Osaka and dive into a ruthless gang war between young delinquents from two rival neighborhoods. Take on the role of Kaito Yamazaki, a young adult from the underprivileged neighborhood of Kamagasaki, and forge your own destiny as you journey through a universe filled with side quests, mini-games, and branching dialogues.

Experience the immersive atmosphere of this game with a real-time dynamic weather system and richly detailed environments. You will have the opportunity to interact with each passerby, each with their own unique identity and character. The open world is enhanced with random events, adding unpredictability and authenticity. Your choices shape the story, leading to various outcomes, deeply enriching your immersion in this captivating world. Additionally, almost every interior can be visited and serves a purpose, further expanding the depth and realism of your experience.

Don't miss out on "Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki," a thrilling urban adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat through varied gameplay mechanics such as combat, role-playing, exploration, and much more. Get ready to dive into a world where your choices matter and every decision can change the course of your story.
70010000091523.intro: Explore the thrilling life of "Kaito Yamazaki"
70010000091523.name: Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki

70010000093410.description:
Let's go fishing on the Nintendo Switch™!
Cast your rod at different locations, each with its own unique scenery and fish to catch!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

[Score Attack]
Catch lots of fish and earn points!
Aim for the biggest fish to earn the biggest rewards!
Keep an eye out for rare creatures—there's more than just fish in this river!

[Ranking]
Compete with players from around the world for the highest score!
Show off your skills by increasing your high score and rank!

[Battle]
Face off against CPUs in single-player mode, or test your skills against friends in multiplayer battles!

[Records]
Each fish that you catch in Score Attack or Battle Mode will be recorded in your encyclopaedia!
Work hard to reel in every fish and fill out every page!
70010000093410.intro:
Swing your rod, reel in your catch, and fish up a big one!
Enjoy a refreshing fishing trip surrounded by nature!
70010000093410.name: Reel it! Fishing

70010000093489.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Sogeumgang, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in Sogeumgang. 
There are a total of 7 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 7 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Sogeumgang, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000093489.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000093489.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Sogeumgang

70010000093497.description:
Help JACK BARAU, the pirate petrel, save his species!
Wander across the island in search of lost fledglings. Each night, artificial lights disorient the Barau’s petrels, leaving the young birds at the mercy of lurking rats and stray cats. Gather a fragile but hopeful parade, and lead them to the ocean—where they can finally take flight toward freedom.

JACK BARAU is a poetic, quirky and heartfelt 2D puzzle-platformer. Inspired by a poignant ecological reality, it puts you in the feathers of an old pirate with a tender heart, the last hope for a critically endangered species.

- Guide Jack with precision through diverse environments.
- Find and protect the fledglings in a growing line of life.
- Avoid deadly predators and nighttime hazards.
- Trigger traps and activate switches to overcome obstacles.
- Explore a stylized world full of humor, emotion, and environmental awareness.

Designed to resonate with players of all ages!

JACK BARAU is a touching adventure — a loving tribute to the real-life Barau’s petrel, a rare seabird native to the highlands of Réunion Island, and to all those working to save it.
70010000093497.intro: A parade of endangered baby petrels, a soft-hearted pirate… Help JACK BARAU save them before it’s too late!
70010000093497.name: Jack Barau

70010000093581.description:
Followers of the notorious Dr. Voo Doom have taken over a city, demanding his release from prison. But this is merely a diversion as they gather Power Crystals to execute their true plan: teleporting their master to freedom!

With the legendary hero Jack on vacation, the fate of Ririland now rests in the hands of Nico, the not-so-heroic lab assistant of Dr. Expo Zicion. Armed with the Statephone, one of the Doctor's eccentric inventions, Nico must rise to the challenge and SAVE the day.

The Statephone is no ordinary device. It allows Nico to SAVE different aspects of his state and LOAD them later to navigate obstacles, solve intricate puzzles, and defeat formidable enemies.

* SAVE your position to return to it later, even if the path to it has been blocked!
* SAVE your momentum while bouncing on a spring to execute a double jump later!
* SAVE your inventory and LOAD it after using an item to double it, then SAVE it again for infinite items!
* … and more!

The possibilities are endless, and the power is in your hands.

SAVE the STATE. SAVE the GAME.


Features:
* Innovative SAVE STATE mechanic inspired by popular emulator features
* Cute and colourful 2.5D pixel graphics
* Visual novel-like hand drawn story scenes
* 40 captivating levels spread across 4 different environments
* 25+ funky, catchy music tracks inspired by the 90s gaming era
70010000093581.intro: Nico must outsmart the evil Dr. Voo Doom’s followers and SAVE Ririland.
70010000093581.name: Nico Saves The State

70010000095197.description:
Find it within the time limit!
Answer correctly to level up. More dice will appear, and the challenge will deepen.
A simple yet profound test of intuition and observation.
Can you reach the highest level?
70010000095197.intro:
1-2-3 or 4-5-6 .....
Spot the outlier.
Among the many dice, there is one that stands out.
70010000095197.name: １-２-３ ｏｒ ４-５-６

70010000095259.description:
Universal Century, Seven-Two-O

Human life on Earth had been wiped out, forcing humanity to migrate to space. The fate of the next migration was entrusted to the REINBOW Nebula. However, the REINBOW Nebula consisted of six planets with completely different environments, all ruled by a single governing planet—and they viewed humanity as an absolute enemy. As time flowed, a mysterious soldier raced through the unknown. When he laid eyes on an armored suit with five radiant lights, his destiny was forever changed.

Into the Future (From the Player's Manual)

This is an action RPG originally released in 1986 in Japan. Players take on the role of the aforementioned mysterious soldier and embark on an adventure across six planets.

The game features a side-view action RPG format, where each planet consists of two stages: an aerial stage with a shooting-based playstyle and an underground stage where hand-to-hand combat and action mechanics come into play. Key locations, such as underground entrances and the end of each stage, feature formidable boss battles. By uncovering their weaknesses, players can experience thrilling and tense encounters.

The game's difficulty is notably high. In aerial combat, running out of fuel causes health to gradually deplete, and when it reaches zero, it's game over. Thus, managing fuel stations as central bases for resupply is essential. On stages where refueling isn't possible, players must carefully select a low-power thruster to conserve fuel. Proper fuel management is a critical technique for survival. Additionally, some stages lack shops altogether, making it crucial to stock up on necessary items beforehand.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000095259.intro: A shooting game depicting a rescue drama set in an underwater city. Avoid obstacles and missile interference as you save the people of the underwater city!
70010000095259.name: EGGCONSOLE MIRAI PC-8801mkIISR

70010000095577.description:
The objective is to use jumps and dashes to get the crystals on the stage.
The stage is a 3D space with vertical, horizontal and depth. Gravity exists, and players control the player by moving forward, backward, left and right, and by jumping vertically to move the player, aiming for the crystal.

Features
・Clear the stage when you get the crystal!
・30 stages in total! There are stages 31 to 60.
・You can choose the difficulty level, and normal is relatively easy to clear. Hard mode is more difficult.
・Some stages have crystals that appear by collecting coins or cutting grass.
・You can get equipment! Get a new weapon, the scythe!
・You can play split-screen with up to 4 people!
・Monsters appear!
・You can use items to use abilities!

Multiplayer
・You can cooperate or compete with everyone.
・Collect coins together,
・Cut grass together
・Clear the stage together.
・Defeat the enemy together!
・Be the first to get the crystal!
70010000095577.intro:
Get your hands on crystals!!
Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players!
30 stages in total. Normal and hard difficulty levels!
70010000095577.name: CRYKEN part2

70010000095825.description:
CATO: Buttered Cat is an adorable puzzle platformer, inspired by the buttered-cat paradox meme: Cats always land on their feet, and toast always lands buttered side down. By strapping a piece of buttered toast to a cat's back, you create a paradox that results in an infinitely spinning, floating butter-cat perpetual motion machine!
The game revolves around the two main characters, "Cat" and "Buttered Toast." You'll need to use the interactions between them to solve various puzzles at each game level. The full game is featuring over 140 main levels and more than 60 side levels. There are also hidden rooms, challenging boss battles, and fun mini-games. The full version will include an outfit system, with 30+ Cat and Toast skins waiting for you to collect!

Cat and Toast Joint Adventure:
・Control the cat as it runs left and right, climbs the cat scratching broad, and even slips through pipes. Hey! cats are liquid!
・Guide the toast meanwhile with the cat, as toast jumps like projectiles. Hold down and power on, and the toast will jump farther!
・When the two combine, they can trigger the paradox, taking the cat to unreachable places!

Whimsical Contraptions:
CATO will take you to a brain-teasing adventure, exploring five different worlds, each filled with unique contraptions.
Including toaster(Toast: NO!!)to buttered trampolines and speed-boasting space pipes(Cat: Meow!!). Along the way, the two will also encounter some mysterious companions to help them with puzzles.

Boss Fights & Mini-Games:
The game is about puzzles, with a little action elements. You don't need to perform difficult platforming for most of the time; just focus on solving the puzzles. However, some pesky enemies will be standing in your way during the adventure. Your abilities will help you defeat them.
As you progress through the adventure, you'll also unlock various mini-games. Once collected, these can be installed on the gaming console in your little hideout, allowing you to play them anytime.

Easter eggs and More:
In the world of CATO: Buttered Cat, there are many hidden rooms that can only be accessed through secret passages. Here, you can find Easter eggs from other worlds and mysterious drop items.
Take them back to your cozy little hideout, put on your favourite outfit, and set off again!

What exactly is the cat and toast searching for? Pieces of these stories are scattered along the adventure, waiting for you to explore.
70010000095825.intro:
CATO = Cat + Toast = Buttered cat paradox = Anti-gravity
200+ puzzles，40+ skins
70010000095825.name: CATO: Buttered Cat

70010000096467.description:
Collect pieces of the cute NekoNekoGirls and complete the puzzle!
Clear stages to see high-quality images of NekoNekoGirls!
70010000096467.intro:
Many cute NekoNekoGirls appear!
An easy puzzle game anyone can play!
70010000096467.name: NekoNeko Girls

70010000096479.description:
Help tiny Kitten get back her favorite paper box only with her agile actions.
In this tight platformer kitten brave hand-crafted challenges, meet cute creatures and finally fight with her old enemy!
This 2D platformer made in the style of handled games from the early '90s.
Play as Kitten run, jump and stomp to defeat difficult levels.
Collect fish to get high score and in the speedrun to get rank around the world.

Feature
Explore the four cute but full of challenge worlds！
Graphics and sound faithful to early '90s handled games
Over 30 hand-crafted challenging levels with cute creatures the kitten like or hate!
70010000096479.intro:
Cute platformer of a kitten cat
Use jump ability to get back her box!
70010000096479.name: Kitten Lost Her Box

70010000096616.description:
Cooking here is a delicious puzzle. Each level is a new dish to prepare, and your challenge is to fit all the ingredients perfectly into the pan. But be careful: space is limited, and only the best chefs will be able to complete each recipe without wasting anything.

How does it work?
You receive different ingredients in various shapes and must move, rotate, and position them so everything fits neatly into the pan. It may seem simple at first, but as you progress, the challenges increase, and strategy becomes essential.

40 levels to test your cooking skills!

Heating the Stoves (Levels 1-10)

More Elaborate Recipes (Levels 11-30)

Master Challenges (Levels 31-40)

With engaging visuals and satisfying effects, Fit and Fry is the perfect experience for puzzle and strategy challenge lovers. Grab your wooden spoon and prove you are the master of kitchen fitting!
70010000096616.name: Fit and Fry

70070000027896.description:
Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

Buy an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere and restore it to its former glory. Get rid of debris and broken furniture, fix up the walls, paint and decorate the place to your liking. Just don’t spend all your cash on the looks right away, you bought a gas station after all. Repair the equipment, buy what can’t be repaired and start serving your customers to earn money for further renovations and improvements.

Can Touch This DLC

Rebuild & Reconstruct!
Take matters into your own hand. Almost literally. With the help of your new, trusty hammer, 
it's time to redecorate like you've never done before. Refurbish walls to your heart's content, 
changing their features and decor as you see fit. Decide where to put trash cans or where to 
move the cash register to. Direct the crowd. Show your customers the right way to orderly 
queue without taking too much space. It's time to take interior customisation to a completely 
new level.
Paint & Spray!
No need to stare at an empty canvas any longer! Grab your spray can and add a little 
personal touch to any surface you can lay your hands on. With adjustable scale and rotation,
you can spray anything from large murals to tiny easter eggs hidden somewhere in the 
corners of your station. Combine existing decals with each other, creating even more 
elaborate and complex pieces of art. And whenever you start feeling like you're running out, 
more designs lie hidden all around for you to unlock!
Warehouse & Workshop
Did you ever feel like your station was missing something? That flair didn't quite measure up 
to par when looking beyond your main building? Have no fear for the future is here. From 
tables to desks to banners and lights, your Warehouse and Workshop now possess a full 
suite of purchasable customisations! Make the diamond in the sand shine even brighter than before.

Let the party begin
There is nothing like a cool night party in the middle of nowhere. When the normal customer traffic goes down, this might be another revenue stream to open up. Create a great party spot to attract people, offer them interesting products and cater to their needs. The more successful your parties and the more the partygoers are satisfied, the more money you earn and the bigger the party.
70070000027896.name: Gas Station Simulator, Can Touch This DLC and Party Time DLC Bundle

70010000092802.description:
Become the director of Spellcaster University in a colorful world of heroic fantasy. Will you turn it into a black magic academy? A place in harmony with nature to train druids and shamans? Or something entirely your own?

- Explore magic
§ Build using magic decks. Each game will be unique 
§ Explore the Arcane Deck to access rooms that defy reality
§ Use the Nature Deck to welcome magic beasts
§ Yield to the Shadow Deck to teach real discipline to all those nasty students!

- Train your students
§ Manage student well-being by building refectories, dormitories, rest rooms... or a dungeon
§ Select your students: personality, alignment, wealth... each aspect is important
§ Discover your students’ future (necromancer, archimage, peasant...) and win new bonuses!

- Customize your school
§ Upgrade your rooms with powerful artifacts like the Soul Eater Bed
§ Fill your school with legendary creatures: dragons, janitors...
§ Choose the rules of your school: exemplary punishments, organic meals, paying dormitories...

- Interact with Factions
§ Negotiate with the Guild. Ask the king for help. Discuss shamanism with the orcs.
§ Threaten the Dark Lord. Pretend to listen to the staff. Lie to the witch hunters.
§ Every choice can have consequences. Be careful before saying “No” to the student delegate!

- Fight against the Darkness
§ Flee from darkness by building in isolated environments
§ Collect powerful grimoires
§ Take advantage of your students' bonuses throughout the campaign!
70010000092802.intro: Open your university of mages. Build rooms, train students, slay orcs and bureaucrats, manage budgets... a director's life is not a quiet one.
70010000092802.name: Spellcaster University

70010000093042.description:
Golf Up Tropical is a fun-loaded golf game you can play with up to 4 friends in several game modes. In Tournament mode, you can pick between the Classic or Points options, in which you earn points by getting good results in the Holes and making quick decisions for bigger bonuses.

You will also be able to play solo in Arcade mode and compare your score in the online ranking with that of your friends and players from around the world. 

Features:
-A variety of holes and game modes.
-Take the wind into account when hitting the ball with effects.
-Easy to play, hard to master.
-Online Ranking.
70010000093042.intro: Enjoy Golf Up Tropical with friends and family!
70010000093042.name: Golf Up Tropical

70010000093354.description:
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a gloomy medieval dark fantasy and try to find all the gnomes.
Meet various characters on your way and try to figure out what happened to this damned world that you yourself (in fact, we) created.

Game Features
- Fancy low-poly style that keeps things cool — literally
- The opportunity to explore the forest well in search of gnomes and feel like a real knight
- A specific goal of the game that you choose yourself
- Procedurally generated world and high replayability
- Five levels, five gnomes, nine story characters
- Six endings depending on your decision
- Unexpected plot twists
- A REAL opportunity to FINALLY find the gnomes
- A feeling of personal involvement in an iconic world event
- Low price matches the level of content's quality
70010000093354.intro: Gnome hunting reaches a new level!
70010000093354.name: Gnomes and Knights

70010000095391.description:
"Phy embarks on a secret mission to an abandoned planet infested by a hostile hivemind. With the help of her partner Lizz and General Eral, she dives into the depths of the infestation and learns the dark truth behind its origins. Help her find the heart of the hive and put an end to this evergrowing threat.

Kill hordes of nasty bugs and use the experience gained to strengthen your arsenal and body with cybernetic enchantments. The hive will adapt and send more powerful enemies to stand in your way. Shoot them down with your army of drones, or slash them to pieces with your blade and stop the hivemind from growing even stronger!

Features:
- Engaging story: Accompany Phy in her quest against the hive
- Immersive world: Experience 19 hand-crafted cyberpunk levels
- High-tech arsenal: 10 fighter drones to upgrade and evolve
- Melee weapons: 5 powerful swords with unique active abilities
- Rogue-lite progression: Unlockable permanent augments
- Contracts: Complete tasks to earn credits

Will you help Phy defeat the hive and save the cyber age from impending doom?"
70010000095391.intro: Survive endless waves of alien creatures and crush the heart of the infestation!
70010000095391.name: CybeRage

70010000097648.description:
Step into Fantasy Grove, a cozy walking adventure set in a magical forest teeming with charm and mystery. Meander through enchanted woodlands, uncover forgotten ruins.

Whether you're going through lush meadows or pausing by a shimmering pond, every path invites you to slow down and enjoy the magic of the moment.

Key Features
A relaxing, exploration-focused experience—no combat, no timers
A handcrafted fantasy world filled with secrets and surprises
Calming music and ambient nature sounds to soothe the senses

Take a breath, follow your curiosity, and lose yourself in the peaceful magic of Fantasy Grove.
70010000097648.intro: Wander Into a World of Whimsy and Wonder
70010000097648.name: Fantasy Grove

70050000057036.description:
"With this DLC, you'll unlock the Green Metro Line.

Green Line DLC features:
- 5 new stations with their own side story
- New drone: Vetter 
- New sword: Stun Baton
- Unique enemies and boss
- Difficulty: Easy

The Green line is available after completing [Station 4]"
70050000057036.intro: Explore the abandoned Zoo and encounter its exotic creatures!
70050000057036.name: CybeRage: Green Line DLC

70050000057037.description:
"With this DLC, you'll unlock the Orange Metro Line.

Orange Line DLC features:
- 5 new stations with their own side story
- New drone: BL-00NY
- New sword: Thor
- Unique enemies and boss
- Difficulty: Medium

The Orange Line is available after completing [Station 10]"
70050000057037.intro: Enter the famous Mockey Land and help your partner!
70050000057037.name: CybeRage: Orange Line DLC

70050000057038.description:
"With this DLC, you'll unlock the Red Metro Line.

Red Line DLC features:
- 5 new stations with their own side story
- New drone: Gravity Crane
- New sword: Jetstream
- Unique enemies and boss
- Difficulty: Hard

The Red line is available after completing [Station 17]"
70050000057038.intro: Inspect the infested harbor and find the giant sea monster!
70050000057038.name: CybeRage: Red Line DLC

70070000027712.description:
Get behind the wheel in Motorbikes Pro 2025 and experience the excitement of high-speed racing! With stunning graphics and intuitive controls, this game is perfect for racers of all ages. 

This thrilling racing game puts you right in the driver’s seat of fast-paced Motorbikes racing action.  Feel the rush as you speed through corners, overtake opponents, and navigate each twist and turn of the track with precision.  Accessible, fun, and incredibly addictive!

Choose your car, perfect your timing, and race your way to glory. The track is calling, and the thrill of victory is just one race away!

This bundle includes base game and Expansion Pack #2 with:

Add style to your rides with this exclusive set of premium skins for your favorite bike.
70070000027712.intro: Feel the Speed, Own the Track!
70070000027712.name: Motorbikes Pro 2025 Premium Edition

70070000027740.description:
"Phy embarks on a secret mission to an abandoned planet infested by a hostile hivemind. With the help of her partner Lizz and General Eral, she dives into the depths of the infestation and learns the dark truth behind its origins. Help her find the heart of the hive and put an end to this evergrowing threat.

Kill hordes of nasty bugs and use the experience gained to strengthen your arsenal and body with cybernetic enchantments. The hive will adapt and send more powerful enemies to stand in your way. Shoot them down with your army of drones, or slash them to pieces with your blade and stop the hivemind from growing even stronger!

Features:
- Engaging story: Accompany Phy in her quest against the hive
- Side stories: Explore 3 new metro lines and discover unique locations
- Immersive world: Experience 34 hand-crafted cyberpunk levels
- High-tech arsenal: 13 fighter drones to upgrade and evolve
- Melee weapons: 8 powerful swords with unique active abilities
- Rogue-lite progression: Unlockable permanent augments
- Contracts: Complete tasks to earn credits

Will you help Phy defeat the hive and save the cyber age from impending doom?"
70070000027740.intro: Survive endless waves of alien creatures and crush the heart of the infestation!
70070000027740.name: CybeRage: Definitive Edition

70070000027834.description:
Welcome to glamorous "Fashion World," where style meets puzzle in a dazzling arcade adventure!

If you've got a flair for fashion and a passion for puzzles, "Fashion World" is your runway to shine. Transform into a chic stylist aiming to capture the most fabulous outfits and become a celebrated fashion photographer.

- 80 levels of fashionable fun!
- Create stunning looks with countless combinations of costumes, accessories, and scenic backdrops!
- Capture your creations in Photo Mode!
- Strive for perfection with the three-star rating system, boosting your game's replay value.
- Designed for fashion lovers of all ages!

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #3 (New Wave) and expansion pack #4 (Retro Fits) with: 

- 40 all-new levels of puzzles
70070000027834.intro: Maker your mark in the Fashion World!
70070000027834.name: Fashion World Discovery Edition

70050000057150.description: Expand your cozy adventure with 10 brand-new levels, filled with even more charming details and hidden objects to discover! Dive into beautifully illustrated scenes, challenge your observation skills, and enjoy the relaxing gameplay that makes Cozy Hunt so special.
70050000057150.intro: More treasures, more charm—keep the hunt going!
70050000057150.name: Cozy Hunt: More to Find

70070000027767.description:
Cozy Hunt is a cute and relaxing hidden object game. In this game, you look for different things hidden in big, beautiful pictures. Each picture is full of funny and sweet details, so it’s always interesting to play. Some things are easy to find, and some are more tricky — but every level is full of surprises!

In Cozy Hunt: More to Find expand your cozy adventure with 10 brand-new levels, filled with even more charming details and hidden objects to discover! Dive into beautifully illustrated scenes, challenge your observation skills, and enjoy the relaxing gameplay that makes Cozy Hunt so special. 

What’s great about this game:
 -50 cute and fun levels — every picture is different!
 -Play with touchscreen or with your controller
 -Beautiful pictures full of cute little things

Relax, look around, and have fun in the cozy world of Cozy Hunt!
70070000027767.intro: Find, explore, and relax in a world full of cute details!
70070000027767.name: Cozy Hunt: Complete Edition

70010000096834.description: Survive hordes of cute (but evil) animals attacking your farm in this fast-paced, lane-based roguelite. Recruit adorable heroes and unlock powerful support animals to protect your farm from relentless attackers!
70010000096834.intro: Help Kitty and her friends to defend their farm!
70010000096834.name: Farmyard Survivors

70010000096955.description:
Welcome to a vibrant, action-packed journey through a world teeming with magic, monsters, and mystery. Choose your hero—be it a brave warrior, clever mage, or swift archer—and step into a realm where every battle brings you closer to glory.

Explore enchanted forests, eerie dungeons, and ancient ruins as you take on fearsome beasts, mighty dragons, and twisted sorcerers. Every fight is a test of your skill, timing, and strategy—level up your character, unlock powerful abilities, and collect rare loot to grow even stronger.

With fast-paced combat and a world brimming with secrets, Raid Legends is a tale of courage, growth, and legendary adventure. Sharpen your blade, ready your spells, and get ready to carve your name into the legends of this magical land.
70010000096955.intro: Step Into a World of Adventure—Your Legend Begins Now.
70010000096955.name: Fantasy RPG: Raid Legends

70010000080387.description:
Fresh out of high school with no job and no ambition, you’ve really got nothing going for you until an alien cartel that wants to get high off humanity invades Earth. Now, you and a team of charismatic talking guns must answer the hero's call and become the deadliest intergalactic bounty hunter the cosmos has ever seen.

Travel to a variety of biomes and locations across the cosmos, go up against the nefarious Garmantuous and his gang of goons, collect loot, meet unique characters, and more, in the latest comedy adventure from Squanch Games!

High On Life: High On Knife DLC
It’s been 2 years since the Bounty Hunter defeated the G3 cartel. Now Knifey needs help tracking down a mysterious package from his homeworld. Will they get mixed up with a friendly giant, a pinball gun, poaching rings, and a terrifying intergalactic shipping company? Yeah. Sure.
70010000080387.name: High On Life

70010000085238.description:
Captain Blood is a pirate-themed action game set on the Spanish Main in the 17th century, where you step into the boots of a fearsome pirate on a quest for gold and glory. Expect wild adventures with cannon firing, pistol shooting, swashbuckling sword fights, and plenty of pirate shenanigans. This action-packed hack'n'slash features fierce hand-to-hand combat, hordes of enemies, and a classic fighting system with flashy combos and epic finishers.

Prepare for intense deck battles where you can fire the ship's cannons and fend off blood-thirsty boarding crews. Collect gold to upgrade your fighting skills, buy new weapons, and become the most feared buccaneer on the high seas. Fight for wealth and glory!

Epic Pirate Shenanigans 
As Captain Blood, live the life of the bravest and most fearsome pirate on the Spanish Main (or at least fake it convincingly).

Intense Action
Dive into fiery hand-to-hand combat and show enemy pirates and landlubbers alike who's the boss with various slick combat techniques.

Ship Deck Brawls
Fight off enemy pirates trying to board your ship with unique moves, combos, and executions while blasting enemy ships to pieces with your cannons!

Arsenal of Awesomeness: 
Arm yourself with cutlasses, pistols, muskets, throwing knives, and hand bombs. Don’t forget those sneaky pirate tricks!

Graphic Novel Vibes
Enjoy a unique art style that feels like you're flipping through a pirate comic book.
70010000085238.name: Captain Blood

70010000093925.description:
Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver invites you to an exciting adventure on the roads of America, progressing through levels set in diverse locations — from industrial zones to quiet suburbs and the bustling city center. From hauling cargo across diverse landscapes to managing your trucking business, this game brings the thrill of the road to life. Your task is to deliver goods on time, improving your driving skills and upgrading your trucks as you go.

Features:
• Diverse levels — Explore unique locations such as industrial areas, suburbs, and a bustling city center, each offering its own challenges.
• External truck customization — Create a unique style for your truck by changing headlights, bumpers, wheels, and more.
• Interior cabin customization — Personalize the cabin’s interior by upgrading dashboards, steering wheels, GPS, and other elements.
• Detailed performance upgrades — Enhance your truck’s performance by upgrading the engine, suspension, and transmission.
• Variety of missions — Complete delivery contracts while handling challenges in different conditions and locations.

Feel like a true professional truck driver as you explore American cities and customize your truck for any challenge! Create a vehicle that reflects your style and improves performance on the road. Load up your truck and start your journey today!
70010000093925.intro: Your Truck, Your Style—Drive, and Conquer the Highways!
70010000093925.name: Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver

70010000095968.description:
In an alternate reality you'd find Stratogun in your nearest arcade, consuming all of your hard-earned pocket change. Stratogun is a modern interpretation of the arcade classics of the 80's. It's easy to pick up, but very difficult to master. Shoot your way through of swarms of enemies, unlock weapons ships & perks to increase your chances of survival. Can you conquer the coveted top spot in the leaderboard, or will you die trying?

At its core Stratogun is an ultra-fast space shooter with tight controls. The game also includes progression as after each run your score is converted to experience points which in turn unlock new gear. Every unlocked item will increase your chances of survival, but in the end it will all boil down to your skills and reaction time. The Red Orbit is ruthless, and only the toughest space pilots will survive the increasingly difficult waves of blood-thirsty enemies.

The visuals of Stratogun draw influence from the arcade classics. Wireframe aesthetics are combined with a kick-ass soundtrack ensuring that this would indeed be something you'd find in an arcade, if those establishments would still be a thing.

Key Features:
• Uncompromised arcade gameplay & difficulty
• Modern, yet arcade-faithful audiovisuals
• Progression & unlockable gear
• Leaderboards
70010000095968.name: Stratogun

70010000092434.description:
Story Background
The thousand-year-old Galactic Empire collapses under the attack of alien creatures. Admirals, pirates, merchant guilds, the Church, mercenaries, and colonists plunge into a chaotic struggle for dominance.

Yet humanity faces an even greater threat: the rebellious AI legions and the resurgence of the alien hive fleets begin their merciless purge of mankind. The climactic battle of Ragnarök has begun! Wield your strategy and courage to end the chaos of the galaxy!

Govern Your Nation
Build various districts on your planets—farmlands, mines, hive cities, and laboratories on the surface; shipyards, armories, and orbital fortresses in space.

Command Warfare
Produce diverse warships and mechs, appoint formidable commanders to lead your fleets, crush enemy forces, and conquer their planets.

Dynamic Events
Hundreds of story-driven events unfold over time, shaped by intricate relationships between characters.

Diplomatic Maneuvers
Navigate a galaxy filled with dozens of major factions and countless minor powers. Forge alliances, subjugate vassals, and sow discord among enemy coalitions.

Policies and Technology
Each faction has a unique policy tree to unlock five advanced unit types and dozens of military/civil bonuses. Research alien biotechnology to develop "Bio-Armor," recover lost tech from drifting arks, or seize enemy blueprints by annihilating rival factions.

Diverse Factions
Eight distinct faction archetypes, each with unique playstyles, exclusive units, and specialized planetary structures.
70010000092434.name: Chaos Galaxy 2

70010000093010.description:
Get ready to dive into the ocean's depths, face fearsome sea creatures and collect experience crystals in roguelike action game Submarine Survivor! As you face the blue unknown, you’ll have to upgrade your submarines with various combinations of weapons and chips to become the Lord of the Ocean. Submarine Survivor balances exploration with highly customizable combat across 2D maps packed with mission nodes.

Use your varied weaponry to efficiently fend off enemy mods while completing map objectives, all culminating in a blood-pumping boss fight! Adjust difficulty with modifiers that change how the game is played, earn passive upgrades with research, craft equipable items and strategise on-the-fly. As you progress, you’ll unlock new submarine models to build out your fleet.

• Fend off waves of dangerous creatures!
• Complete objectives to reach new areas.
• Adjust difficulty and customise your gameplay experience!
• Unlock and upgrade new submarine types.
• Choose new equipment, passive skills and weapons wisely!
• Take down big bosses to assert your dominance as Lord of the Ocean!
70010000093010.intro: Master the seas, tame what lies beneath and live to explore another day!
70010000093010.name: Submarine Survivor

70010000094062.description:
Create, shake and mix! Choose your ingredients and enjoy the art of mixing cocktails. Each combination opens up endless flavour possibilities for you to explore. Simple to play and addictive fun at your fingertips. Play, mix and repeat!

Discover the perfect mix and let the flavour explosion begin! One perfect pour can set off a delicious chain reaction of unique drinks and stylish glass fillings. Search for the best recipes and hidden surprises. The choice is yours - mix as long as you like!

Master the secrets of cocktail making. Collect garnishes, improve your skills, find secret recipes and unlock new drinks as you progress through levels of bartending skill.

Check out this fun new game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Make your best cocktail!
70010000094062.intro: Make a unique cocktail for your friends!
70010000094062.name: Cocktail Rush

70010000088779.description:
Step into a peaceful, rainy world with Beautiful Anime Puzzles – Rainy Days! This calming puzzle game invites players to solve gorgeous anime-inspired images while immersing themselves in the serene atmosphere of a rainy day. Every puzzle provides a relaxing escape, as the soothing rain and tranquil ambiance create the perfect environment to unwind.

With a wide selection of puzzles ranging from simple to more complex, Beautiful Anime Puzzles – Rainy Days offers an engaging challenge for puzzle lovers of all skill levels. The adjustable difficulty settings ensure that whether you're a beginner or an experienced puzzler, the game provides just the right amount of challenge. As each puzzle piece clicks into place, you reveal stunning, anime-inspired artwork that ranges from soft pastel illustrations to dramatic, intricately detailed scenes.

The game is designed to provide more than just a puzzle-solving experience; it’s a journey into a world of beauty and calm. The relaxing background music, coupled with the sound of gentle rain, creates a peaceful atmosphere that allows players to escape into a world of anime art and reflection. As each puzzle is completed, a sense of accomplishment and satisfaction washes over, making every solved image a reward for both the mind and soul.

Whether you're looking for a moment of tranquility during a busy day, or seeking a mental challenge to engage your mind, Beautiful Anime Puzzles – Rainy Days offers something for everyone. Immerse yourself in stunning art, embrace the calming effect of rainy day vibes, and enjoy hours of puzzle-solving fun that lets you unwind and reconnect with the peaceful side of life. Each puzzle you complete brings you closer to a world of serenity and beauty, offering a peaceful retreat anytime you need a break from the world.
70010000088779.intro: Relax and solve beautiful anime puzzles in Beautiful Anime Puzzles – Rainy Days, where rainy day vibes meet stunning art!
70010000088779.name: Beautiful Anime Puzzles - Rainy Days

70010000092293.description:
When a wormhole tears open in space, an astronaut is hurled down and crashes on a distant planet. But where is she? Where are all the inhabitants of the planet? And how is she going to get back home? Solve the puzzle and piece together the mystery in this 2D, pixel art, first person, point and click adventure.

Drawing on the spirit of classic 90s adventure games, The Abandoned Planet blends atmospheric exploration with clever puzzles to deliver a nostalgic yet fresh experience.

• Beautiful chunky pixel art
• Hundreds of locations to explore
• Classic point and click adventure
• Fully voiced in English
70010000092293.intro: A retro-inspired, pixel art, point and click adventure.
70010000092293.name: The Abandoned Planet

70010000092776.description:
Kill the Emoji 2 is here, and it’s bigger, louder, and more insane than ever before! Get ready to dive into the most over-the-top, emoji-blasting FPS adventure known to humanity. Face epic trials in Challenge Mode, where each level is a battle of wits, skill, and firepower. Then, plunge into the chaotic abyss of Survival Mode, where endless emoji waves crash down on you as you scavenge weapons, grab ammo, and fight for your life in a never-ending showdown.
The emojis are angrier, the battles are harder, and the weapons are even more ridiculous. Unleash pure destruction as you mow down evil emojis with explosive weapons, dodge their relentless attacks, and prove that you are the ultimate emoji destroyer. Whether you’re fuelled by hate for their smug little faces or just want to revel in total carnage, this game delivers an unforgettable FPS experience.
Join the fight, save the world (or at least your sanity), and become the legend the emoji apocalypse never saw coming. Lock, load, and annihilate—because this time, it’s personal!
70010000092776.intro: Unleash chaos in the ultimate showdown against endless emoji hordes!
70010000092776.name: Kill The Emoji 2

70010000092827.description:
Capybara Zen will help you relax, clear your mind, breathe and forget about stress.

Together with the adorable capybara and her kitty friend, indulge in meditation. Listen to the music, breathe, turn off your head and focus on yourself - here and now!

- original music with a positive effect on the chakras
- cozy charming illustrations
- breathing according to the rhythm of the sounds
- Tibetan bowls, bells, humming of the forest 
- simple and intuitive commands
70010000092827.intro: Take a deep breath and meditate with a capybara!
70010000092827.name: Capybara Zen

70010000093224.description:
Dust off your torch and hammer - it's time to get back to work, you have a new job to do. Visit the new beach coast with the largest, biggest ship graveyard in the world, dismantle huge ship parts and collect tons of precious steel. Roll up your sleeves, it's time to get back to the business.

In the game, you can expect new bigger ships, new gameplay mechanics, features and improvements, but also well-known mechanics from the first game that have been significantly improved.

IT'S GOOD TO BE BACK IN THE BUSINESS! 
Ship Graveyard Simulator is back bigger than before and it doesn't matter if you're a veteran in the game or for the first time you will have a hammer and a torch in your hands there are a dozen of kilometres of wreckage on the coast, and thousands of tons of steel - you will get into this business.

DISASSEMBLE BIG SHIP PARTS
Large ship parts? Oh yes! You will need a special crane and a large container for it. Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 will have large fragments, modules and wreck components available for demolition, including engines, pumps, control panels, and much more.

HUGE SHIPS
Order new ships waiting for demolition via the computer in your home, and with the new ship, you will receive a new task! Collect all the necessary steel, aluminium, or copper parts, even a small part has its own value. There will be several types of ships available in the game, which will be divided into individual categories - some of them are real colossi.

DESTRUCTION
Your main task in the game is to dismantle ships into small parts. Some of them will be small, but a huge challenge awaits you, which will be the disassembly of real giants, and hiring workers who will be able to help you. Use the available tools - hammer, saw, torch, etc. - to disassemble individual pieces of the ship into smaller pieces, collect as many of them as possible and develop your business!

DANGERS
Remember that you are doing one of the most dangerous jobs in the world and you disarm the biggest shipwrecks in the world, so what could go wrong? In Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 there are many dangers waiting for you - gas leakage, electric shock from cable, and poisoning with toxins in unsecured rooms. Do you remember about large fragments and ship modules? You'd better have your helmet on.

This game include Warships DLC as part of the base game, included ships are:
-Chevy
-Fuso
-Wicher
70010000093224.intro: Take care of destroying and recovering materials from shipwrecks.
70010000093224.name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2

70010000094087.description:
〇 Simple Controls, Deep Gameplay!
The core actions are attack, jump, and air dash.
Mastering 8-directional attacks and air dashes—up, down, left, right, and diagonals—is the key to overcoming challenges!

〇 Impenetrable Dungeons
A high-difficulty platformer that can't be cleared without skillfully using the basic actions awaits your challenge!

〇 Terrifying Bosses
Powerful bosses await deep within the dungeons.
Enjoy intense parry-based combat during boss fights!
Even if you fall, rise again and keep fighting!

〇 A Boy and Girl’s Adventure
A brave boy and girl journey through a dangerous world in search of a new land.
Will there be hope at the end of the many meetings and farewells, joys and sorrows they experience?
See the answer for yourself!

We welcome all action gamers confident in their skills!
70010000094087.intro: A boy and a girl with a mysterious weapon drone in their hands embark on an adventurous journey from their small underground village to the vast world of new lands.
70010000094087.name: MOMIBOSU

70010000094751.description:
Undivine is a dark metroidvania with RPG elements that will challenge your courage and wits. Step into a world shrouded in mystery and desolation, where every corner hides dangers and ancient secrets. The world of Undivine is filled with relics, items, NPCs, bosses, secrets, and much more, all waiting to be discovered. It's a world ready for you to explore. 
 
Known only as the traveller, you arrive at the outskirts of a desolate village. The people there live in fear of a giant hole that has opened in the middle of the village, swallowing most of its residents. Brave warriors have attempted to venture into the chasm, but none have returned. With no other choice, you descend into the abyss, only to find a vast, interconnected world filled with mysteries and mysticism. It is up to you to uncover its secrets. Will you be able to face the one behind it all? 
 
Combat in Undivine is fast and satisfying. Use everything at your disposal to face the many enemies you will encounter. Relics, swords, armour, and accessories have unique features that will change the way you play the game. Combine sword attacks with the powers of your Relics to execute combos and escape from enemies' attacks. Find the best combination that suits your playstyle.
70010000094751.name: Undivine

70010000095005.description:
Discover the secret of a forgotten war in Wings of Endless, a platforming Action-RPG with a captivating Pixelart style that will draw you in from start to finish. Step into the role of Hariku, a brash bounty hunter who boasts of being the best at his craft.

His life dramatically changes when a seemingly routine task morphs into an epic adventure, revealing the mysteries of an ancient war that was believed to have ended generations ago.

Accompanied by his enigmatic talking owl, Owly, and various unexpected allies, Hariku will explore vast varied landscapes, from arid deserts and damp marshlands to thick forests and icy snow zones. Every corner of this fascinating world is packed with secrets waiting to be uncovered.
 
Features:

- Huge and diverse world: From deserts to snowy forests.
- Gripping story: Unveil the secrets of an ancient war.
- Dynamic combat: Three unique heroes switchable in real-time.
- Numerous side missions: Discover more about the world of “Wings of Endless”.
- Consumable crafting: Create powerful potions.
- Wide variety of enemies and puzzles: Challenges and puzzles at every turn.
70010000095005.intro: An epic 2D ARPG adventure awaits in the world of Wings of Endless!
70010000095005.name: Wings of Endless

70010000095046.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Garorim Bay, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 3 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000095046.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000095046.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Garorim Bay

70010000095760.description:
Ellphaser throws you into a frozen world where every jump reshapes reality. In this 2D platformer with puzzle mechanics, platforms disappear and reappear with each jump, creating dynamic challenges at every move.

Control a fearless elephant and plan each jump carefully to escape traps—sharp spikes, electric orbs, and unstable platforms are waiting for a misstep.

Explore a frozen mountain, where the calm atmosphere contrasts with the growing challenge. As you progress, new obstacles emerge: elevators, keys, locked doors, and increasingly complex layouts that test your strategy and reflexes.

Each level is a puzzle, and only those who master the balance between jumping and planning will find the exit. Ready to defy gravity and logic?
70010000095760.intro: An elephant, precise jumps, and a world that changes with every leap!
70010000095760.name: Ellphaser

70010000096144.description:
Key Gameplay Features:
- 50 levels of pizza-making fun (and you can keep going after that!)
- Play as a cat or a bunny – your bestie runs the market!
- Grow your own ingredients or buy them fresh
- Mix dough, chop toppings, bake pizzas, and race against the clock
- Randomly generated orders with tips, coins, and XP to earn
- Tons of upgrades: auto-watering, faster machines, more oven space, and more
- Max 4 orders at once – so stay sharp, chef!


In this cozy cooking game, you’ll grow ingredients, prep toppings, and serve up perfect pizzas. Pick your character (cat or bunny), and your fluffy friend will run the local market while you handle the hustle.


Each day starts slow – you can water crops, harvest goodies, slice toppings, or run to the market. But once the restaurant opens (whether you're ready or not), orders start rolling in fast! Mix dough, blend sauce, chop veggies, and get those pizzas in the oven before time runs out.


The more you play, the more upgrades you unlock – like faster machines, more ingredient storage, and ovens that bake three pizzas at once. Orders get bigger, days get busier, but with your upgraded kitchen, you’ll be tossing out masterpieces like a pro.

No rush though. Just don’t let the pizzas burn.
70010000096144.intro: Welcome to your new life as the only pizza farmer-baker around!
70010000096144.name: Cat&Rabbit Pizza Farming

70010000096321.description:
Silence swallows everything. Twelve inmates watch you from the shadows—beautiful, dangerous, and disturbingly captivating.
They are not looking for love… they are looking for control.

Their words feel like poisoned caresses, their gestures are traps disguised as desire.
Here, every glance can draw you closer… or drag you into their deadly game.

Will you become their confidant, their obsession... or their next victim?

Features
-12 dangerously irresistible minds — From the manipulator who weaves lies like silk to the sweet psychopath who loves without knowing how to stop destroying.

-Seduce or survive — Every word matters. Every silence screams. Play with their emotions… or fall into their trap.

-Limited time — The clock is ticking. Love them and you might survive… or be damned.

-Multiple endings — Romance, betrayal, death… or something far worse. Your fate is in your hands.

-Hidden secrets — Break through their masks and make them fall for you to unlock seductive illustrations revealing their most intimate—and twisted—side.


They are waiting.
And they won't give up.

Here, love is a weapon, passion is poison… and you are the perfect prey.

Dare to play.
But remember:
Sometimes, the one who swears eternal love
is the one digging your grave.
70010000096321.intro: Twelve prisoners. One single goal: seduce you, possess you… and break you.Unless you make them fall in love with you first.
70010000096321.name: Date with a Serial Killer: A Love Story from a Horror Show Series

70050000056809.description: Discover the next part of Spy Guy Hidden Objects series and get carried away to Ancient Greece!
70050000056809.intro: Try your luck in Ancient Greece!
70050000056809.name: Spy Guy Greece

70070000027604.description:
Spy Guy sets off to Ancient Greece in search of hidden objects. Discover a beautiful, colorful map full of characters from Greek Mythology.
- 120 new levels
- unique map
- new story
- more than 500 hidden objects
70070000027604.intro: Discover the legends of ancient Greece with Spy Guy!
70070000027604.name: Spy Guy Legends of Greece

70010000085714.description:
A PLATFORM FIGHTER ROGUELIKE
Spiritfall combines tight Platform Fighter combat, smooth movement, and Roguelite mechanics into one! Trek across dangerous lands, string together deadly combos to fend off swarms of enemies, and harness an ever-changing set of powers through a randomly generated map.

DIVINE SYNERGIES AWAIT
The divine spirits offer powerful blessings that enhance your abilities in combat. Discover your favorite abilities, and experiment with different builds. With over 150+ blessings to choose from, these gifts allow for a range of tactical approaches that encourage you to find synergies that fit your playstyle.

GROW STRONGER FROM DEFEAT
Death is but a temporary setback. Reawaken stronger than before at the Sanctum and continue your adventure. Use the resources you gathered to upgrade your skills, unlock unique powers, and awaken mighty weapons with unique movesets.
70010000085714.name: Spiritfall

70010000093415.description:
Step into the furry paws of Bearnard, a master archer and reluctant hero. He embarks on an epic adventure to begrudgingly reclaim a legendary bow and defend his woodland home. In this single-player, story-driven journey, you'll explore diverse landscapes, battle countless enemies, solve physics-based puzzles, and meet a cast of quirky characters. Collect and unleash powerful cards in turn-based battles, carefully strategizing each move to outwit and overcome your foes.

In-Depth Card Play and Strategy
Discover and wield over 60+ powerful cards, transforming every battle into a dynamic, ever-evolving puzzle. Whether it’s arrow-charging power-ups, life-saving healing, armor-stealing attacks, defensive traps, or crowd control, there's a card for every situation. Combine elemental cards to create devastating combos.

Become a Master Archer to Dish Out Your Cards
In battles, you don’t just play cards, you need to hit your foes with that perfect bullseye arrow too. Luckily Bearnard is a master of the bow and arrow. Carefully aim each shot, use physics to your advantage, and master intricate adjustments to land the right shots.

An 8-Bit Era-Inspired Platforming Adventure
Visually inspired by classic 8-bit platformers that started a gaming revolution, Bearnard takes you through lush forests, abandoned mines, snowy mountains, towering castles, and dark dungeons.. Each biome is filled with its own challenges and lurking evil.

Discover Secrets and Harness Physics to Defeat Your Foes
Bearnard’s world is filled with hidden secrets and puzzles that require both skill and thinking. Shoot arrows at levers to open hidden passages, trigger platforms to launch yourself to new heights, or use the environment to your advantage—drop chandeliers on enemies, throw crates for crushing blows, and manipulate physics to gain the upper hand in battle.
70010000093415.intro: Retro puzzle platformer with modern turn-based combat and card battles.
70010000093415.name: Bearnard

70010000096153.description:
GAMEPLAY:
Ninja Fight – This is an exciting fighting game in Asian style. You alone must confront a whole crowd of villains and only your steel fists will help you win! Choose one of the available heroes and go into battle. Clear the entire street from bandits to complete the level.

FEATURES LIST:
- Spectacular combat system
- Bright oriental atmosphere
- Seven heroes to choose from
- Two levels are available in daytime, nighttime and sunset
70010000096153.intro: Exciting fighting game in oriental style. Choose your character and go to fight!
70010000096153.name: Ninja Fight

70010000096623.description:
Gym Lifting Hero: Tile Master is a game that uses Tile Match combined with fitness elements to create a special and one-of-a-kind training environment.

Rigorous training mode: By completing workouts and improving abilities, you will take control of the main character, a weak man who is just starting to work out at the gym, and help him gain muscle, strength and agility.

Challenges and exercise goals: To progress and take on new challenges, you must achieve your daily exercise goals. The tasks become more difficult as you level up, but the rewards also become greater.

You must complete Tile Match 3 levels with special features such as Shuffle or Undo to help players complete previous levels faster and earn money to improve their workouts and training tools.
In addition to training, you can also participate in other exciting mini-games such as boxing, hide and seek or even Team Up 5v5 with other opponents.

This unique gameplay, different from traditional tile games, will immerse you in an exciting and challenging world.

Features:
Relaxing and addictive gameplay
Idle gym management
Collect money even offline
Upgrades and expansions
Compete in a tournament
Simple and intuitive controls
Play at your own pace
70010000096623.intro: Level up your Hero in the Gym!
70010000096623.name: Gym Lifting Hero

70010000087170.description:
Linea is a beautiful game all about discovery, where narrative & puzzles meld together. Follow the flow of light & help each character as they journey through their own unique stories. With every puzzle you complete, a new line of dialogue will open up to progress further in the heartwarming story. Each new story is completely unique from the last, with its own locations, characters and dialogues to explore in 14 different languages.

Journey along with us through this series of short challenging puzzle stories, where every solved puzzle will not only open up to progress in the story, but also increasingly harder puzzles, introducing new objectives and hurdles the farther you go.
70010000087170.intro: Join unique characters on their wholesome journeys and guide them through beautifully crafted worlds by solving puzzles with your shining light.
70010000087170.name: Linea: An Innerlight Game

70010000094169.description:
Labyrinth of the Demon King is a challenging first-person dungeon crawler with survival horror elements, set against the backdrop of a mythical feudal Japan besieged by demons. As a lone foot soldier, embark on a quest to track down and slay the Demon King who killed your Lord. But will you have the skill, resources and stamina needed to survive through all the horrors this brutal world will throw at you?

THE WORLD IS IN CHAOS, AND HAS ENTERED THE LATTER AGE OF THE DHARMA.
SOCIETY IS CRUMBLING AND WAR HAS SPREAD THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY.
DISEASE AND FAMINE HAVE KILLED THOUSANDS, AND DEMONS WALK THE VERY EARTH ITSELF.
YOU ARE AN 'ASHIGARU', A FOOT SOLDIER IN THE SERVICE OF LORD TAKEDA NOBUMITSU.

DECEIVED BY A POWERFUL DEMON KING, YOUR LORD LED HIS ARMY INTO AN AMBUSH. ALL PERISHED EXCEPT FOR YOU. AGAINST YOUR WISHES YOUR LORD SACRIFICED HIS LIFE TO AID YOUR ESCAPE FROM THE BATTLE.

YOU HAVE MADE A VOW TO TRACK DOWN THE DEMON WHO BETRAYED YOUR LORD AND END ITS LIFE.
YOU TAKE WHAT COULD POSSIBLY BE YOUR FINAL BREATHS ON THIS MORTAL PLANE, AND PREPARE YOURSELF TO ENTER…

THE LABYRINTH OF THE DEMON KING.

---

DISCOVER A GRIM WORLD
Immerse yourself in the foreboding, dark world of the Demon King, a setting inspired by feudal Japan and brought to life in a gorgeous retro-grim art style.

PROVE YOURSELF IN COMBAT
Arm yourself with your wits and a select range of weapons, from katanas and naginatas to muskets and bows, as you engage in brutal, challenging combat. Revel in accomplishment and extreme satisfaction as you take down various Yōkai from ancient myth, and other horrific abominations that dwell in the labyrinth.

EXPLORE THE LABYRINTH
As you trudge through the dark, twisted corridors of the Labyrinth, explore every nook and cranny for limited resources. Sets of armor and talismans change your fortunes in combat, and important clues help solve puzzles laid out before you by the Demon King.
70010000094169.intro: Venture through the Labyrinth Of The Demon King, solving puzzles and fighting fearsome monsters in an epic quest to track down the demon who betrayed your lord and end its life.
70010000094169.name: LABYRINTH OF THE DEMON KING

70010000092852.description:
Get ready for adrenaline-fueled racing fun as you climb your way through the motorsports ranks in pure arcade style! Super Engine GT Turbo SPEC is all about speed and pushing your driving skills to the limit.
